definition: black clothes/servant (old)/young woman role in Chinese opera, also called 正旦[zheng4 dan4]
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.english: Promoted to Year 2 of Higher Diploma in Human Resource Management, Tsing Yi Campus.
sentences.chinese: 升读青衣分校人力资源管理学高级文凭课程二年级。

sentences.english: The traditional Chinese opera competition begins today with the initial special competition of Qingyi.
sentences.chinese: 戏曲擂台赛今日开擂，首场比赛是青衣专场。

sentences.english: Shop 101, Mayfia Gardens Shopping Arcade, Tsing Yi, N. T.
sentences.chinese: 新界青衣美景花园商场101号地铺。

sentences.english: However, i ty dance as stand alone bridge.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我却青衣舞袖般孤独地伫立断桥。

sentences.english: Tsing Yi Ferry, Willow Bridge, a leaf boat, sending the spring, Ta Shui river flows.
sentences.chinese: 青衣渡口，绿柳桥头，一片叶舟，送春，踏水东流。

sentences.english: Tsing Yi, doors will open on the right. Please take all your baggage with you.
sentences.chinese: 青衣，右边的车门将会打开，请不要忘记您的行李。

sentences.english: They were met by black-clad police with helmets, face masks and small round riot shields.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察，全副武装，青衣面甲，手执圆盾。

sentences.english: The Qingyi and Huadan will sing without microphone.
Appin Animal Hospital, G/F, No. 40, Tsing Yu New Village, Tsing Yi, New Territories, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 乐比动物医院，香港新界青衣青裕新村40号地下。

sentences.english: Attention please, train arriving at platform no. 3 will stop at Tsing Yi station.
sentences.chinese: 请注意，即将进入三号月台之列车将以青衣为终点站。

definition: purple qipao gown, the sign of an official position
long gown/cheongsam/traditional Asian dress for men or (in Hong Kong) women's qipao
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
